typeProperties.script:
parameters{
	ProcessName as string,
	FileName as string,
	Etl_Utc_Tag as string
}
source(output(
		GL_Code as string,
		GL_Desc as string,
		Category as string,
		Cash_Flow_Code as string,
		GL_Parent_Code as string,
		GL_Level_Code as integer,
		Debit_Credit as string,
		Reporting_1 as string,
		Reporting_2 as string,
		Reporting_3 as string,
		Reporting_4 as string,
		Reporting_5 as string,
		Reporting_6 as string,
		Reporting_7 as string,
		Reporting_8 as string,
		Reporting_9 as string,
		Reporting_10 as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> StagingDB
source(output(
		GL_Code as string,
		GL_Desc as string,
		Category as string,
		Cash_Flow_Code as string,
		GL_Parent_Code as string,
		GL_Level_Code as integer,
		Debit_Credit as string,
		Reporting_1 as string,
		Reporting_2 as string,
		Reporting_3 as string,
		Reporting_4 as string,
		Reporting_5 as string,
		Reporting_6 as string,
		Reporting_7 as string,
		Reporting_8 as string,
		Reporting_9 as string,
		Reporting_10 as string,
		start_datetime as timestamp,
		end_datetime as timestamp,
		record_deleted_flag as integer,
		process_name as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'SELECT [GL_Code]\n      ,[GL_Desc]\n      ,[Category]\n      ,[Cash_Flow_Code]\n      ,[GL_Parent_Code]\n      ,[GL_Level_Code]\n      ,[Debit_Credit]\n      ,[Reporting_1]\n      ,[Reporting_2]\n      ,[Reporting_3]\n      ,[Reporting_4]\n      ,[Reporting_5]\n      ,[Reporting_6]\n      ,[Reporting_7]\n      ,[Reporting_8]\n      ,[Reporting_9]\n      ,[Reporting_10]\n      ,[start_datetime]\n      ,[end_datetime]\n      ,[record_deleted_flag]\n      ,[process_name]\n  FROM [relational].[Chart_of_Account]\n  WHERE [record_deleted_flag] = 0',
	format: 'query') ~> RelationDB
StagingDB derive(StagingChecksum = sha2(256, GL_Desc,Category,Cash_Flow_Code,GL_Parent_Code,GL_Level_Code,Debit_Credit,Reporting_1,Reporting_2,Reporting_3,Reporting_4,Reporting_5,Reporting_6,Reporting_7,Reporting_8,Reporting_9,Reporting_10)) ~> StatgingAddChecksum
StatgingAddChecksum, RelationRenameColumns lookup(GL_Code == Relation_GL_Code,
	broadcast: 'none')~> LookupRelationalStream
RelationDB derive(RelationalChecksum = sha2(256, GL_Desc,Category,Cash_Flow_Code,GL_Parent_Code,GL_Level_Code,Debit_Credit,Reporting_1,Reporting_2,Reporting_3,Reporting_4,Reporting_5,Reporting_6,Reporting_7,Reporting_8,Reporting_9,Reporting_10)) ~> RelationalAddChecksum
LookupRelationalStream split(isNull(Relation_RelationalChecksum),
	StagingChecksum != Relation_RelationalChecksum,
	disjoint: false) ~> ConditionalSplitNewOrExpire@(StagingNewRow, StagingChangedRow, IgnoreNoChange)
RelationalAddChecksum select(mapColumn(
		Relation_GL_Code = GL_Code,
		Relation_GL_Desc = GL_Desc,
		Relation_Category = Category,
		Relation_Cash_Flow_Code = Cash_Flow_Code,
		Relation_GL_Parent_Code = GL_Parent_Code,
		Relation_GL_Level_Code = GL_Level_Code,
		Relation_Debit_Credit = Debit_Credit,
		Relation_Reporting_1 = Reporting_1,
		Relation_Reporting_2 = Reporting_2,
		Relation_Reporting_3 = Reporting_3,
		Relation_Reporting_4 = Reporting_4,
		Relation_Reporting_5 = Reporting_5,
		Relation_Reporting_6 = Reporting_6,
		Relation_Reporting_7 = Reporting_7,
		Relation_Reporting_8 = Reporting_8,
		Relation_Reporting_9 = Reporting_9,
		Relation_Reporting_10 = Reporting_10,
		Relation_start_datetime = start_datetime,
		Relation_end_datetime = end_datetime,
		Relation_record_deleted_flag = record_deleted_flag,
		Relation_process_name = process_name,
		Relation_RelationalChecksum = RelationalChecksum
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> RelationRenameColumns
ConditionalSplitNewOrExpire@StagingNewRow select(mapColumn(
		GL_Code,
		GL_Desc,
		Category,
		Cash_Flow_Code,
		GL_Parent_Code,
		GL_Level_Code,
		Debit_Credit,
		Reporting_1,
		Reporting_2,
		Reporting_3,
		Reporting_4,
		Reporting_5,
		Reporting_6,
		Reporting_7,
		Reporting_8,
		Reporting_9,
		Reporting_10
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> SelectNewStagingRow
SelectNewStagingRow derive(start_datetime = fromUTC(currentUTC(), 'Australia/Sydney'),
		end_datetime = toTimestamp('9999-12-31 00:00:00'),
		record_deleted_flag = toInteger(0),
		process_name = concatWS('-',$ProcessName,$FileName)) ~> AddAuditColumns
UnionForDB alterRow(insertIf(record_deleted_flag==toInteger(0)),
	updateIf(record_deleted_flag==toInteger(1))) ~> AlterRowInsertUpdateExpire
ConditionalSplitNewOrExpire@StagingChangedRow derive(start_datetime = fromUTC(currentUTC(), 'Australia/Sydney'),
		end_datetime = toTimestamp('9999-12-31 00:00:00'),
		record_deleted_flag = toInteger(0),
		process_name = concatWS('-', $ProcessName, $FileName)) ~> UpdateAddAuditAttributes
ConditionalSplitNewOrExpire@StagingChangedRow derive(end_datetime = fromUTC(currentUTC(), 'Australia/Sydney'),
		record_deleted_flag = toInteger(1)) ~> AddExpiredAttributes
UpdateAddAuditAttributes select(mapColumn(
		GL_Code,
		GL_Desc,
		Category,
		Cash_Flow_Code,
		GL_Parent_Code,
		GL_Level_Code,
		Debit_Credit,
		Reporting_1,
		Reporting_2,
		Reporting_3,
		Reporting_4,
		Reporting_5,
		Reporting_6,
		Reporting_7,
		Reporting_8,
		Reporting_9,
		Reporting_10,
		start_datetime,
		end_datetime,
		record_deleted_flag,
		process_name
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> UpdateSelectForInsert
AddAuditColumns, UpdateSelectForInsert, UpdateSelectForExpire union(byName: true)~> UnionForDB
AddExpiredAttributes select(mapColumn(
		GL_Code = Relation_GL_Code,
		GL_Desc = Relation_GL_Desc,
		Category = Relation_Category,
		Cash_Flow_Code = Relation_Cash_Flow_Code,
		GL_Parent_Code = Relation_GL_Parent_Code,
		GL_Level_Code = Relation_GL_Level_Code,
		Debit_Credit = Relation_Debit_Credit,
		Reporting_1 = Relation_Reporting_1,
		Reporting_2 = Relation_Reporting_2,
		Reporting_3 = Relation_Reporting_3,
		Reporting_4 = Relation_Reporting_4,
		Reporting_5 = Relation_Reporting_5,
		Reporting_6 = Relation_Reporting_6,
		Reporting_7 = Relation_Reporting_7,
		Reporting_8 = Relation_Reporting_8,
		Reporting_9 = Relation_Reporting_9,
		Reporting_10 = Relation_Reporting_10,
		start_datetime = Relation_start_datetime,
		process_name = Relation_process_name,
		end_datetime,
		record_deleted_flag
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> UpdateSelectForExpire
AlterRowInsertUpdateExpire sink(input(
		GL_Code as string,
		GL_Desc as string,
		Category as string,
		Cash_Flow_Code as string,
		GL_Parent_Code as string,
		GL_Level_Code as integer,
		start_datetime as timestamp,
		end_datetime as timestamp,
		record_deleted_flag as integer,
		process_name as string,
		Debit_Credit as string,
		Reporting_1 as string,
		Reporting_2 as string,
		Reporting_3 as string,
		Reporting_4 as string,
		Reporting_5 as string,
		Reporting_6 as string,
		Reporting_7 as string,
		Reporting_8 as string,
		Reporting_9 as string,
		Reporting_10 as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:true,
	upsertable:false,
	keys:['GL_Code'],
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		GL_Code,
		GL_Desc,
		Category,
		Cash_Flow_Code,
		GL_Parent_Code,
		GL_Level_Code,
		start_datetime,
		end_datetime,
		record_deleted_flag,
		process_name,
		Debit_Credit,
		Reporting_1,
		Reporting_2,
		Reporting_3,
		Reporting_4,
		Reporting_5,
		Reporting_6,
		Reporting_7,
		Reporting_8,
		Reporting_9,
		Reporting_10
	)) ~> InsertUpdateRow

source(output(
		Date as string,
		Transaction_Code as string,
		Cashflow_Code as string,
		Fund_ID as string,
		Asset_ID as string,
		Trx_Type as string,
		GL_Code as string,
		GL_Description as string,
		Amount as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> LoadFromScrubbedToStagingDB
source(output(
		Asset_ID as string,
		Fund_ID as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'SELECT [Asset_ID]\n      ,[Fund_ID]\n  FROM [relational].[Asset]\n  WHERE [record_deleted_flag] = 0',
	format: 'query') ~> GetAssetMaster
source(output(
		GL_Code as string,
		Category as string,
		Cash_Flow_Code as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'SELECT [GL_Code]\n      ,[Category]\n      ,[Cash_Flow_Code]\n  FROM [relational].[Chart_of_Account]\n  WHERE [record_deleted_flag] = 0',
	format: 'query') ~> GetGLCodes
ConvertAmountToValidFormat select(mapColumn(
		Date,
		Transaction_Code,
		Cashflow_Code,
		Fund_ID,
		Asset_ID,
		Trx_Type,
		GL_Code,
		GL_Description,
		Amount
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> SelectSourceColumns
UnionAll derive(Debit_Credit = case(greaterOrEqual(toDecimal(Amount),0),'DR','CR'),
		Trx_Amount = abs(toDecimal(Amount,18,2)),
		Date = toTimestamp(Date,'dd/MM/yyyy')) ~> SetDerivations
SetDerivations select(mapColumn(
		Trx_Date = Date,
		Trx_Code = Transaction_Code,
		Cash_Flow_Code = Cashflow_Code,
		Fund_ID,
		Asset_ID,
		Trx_Type,
		GL_Code,
		Trx_Desc = GL_Description,
		validation_error = Validation_Error,
		Debit_Credit,
		Trx_Amount
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectForTarget
SelectSourceColumns, SelectFundColumns lookup(Asset_ID == Relation_Asset_ID
	&& Fund_ID == Relation_Fund_ID,
	broadcast: 'none')~> LookupFundAndAsset
GetAssetMaster select(mapColumn(
		Relation_Asset_ID = Asset_ID,
		Relation_Fund_ID = Fund_ID
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> SelectFundColumns
SelectGLData, SelectCOAcolumns lookup(GL_Code == Relation_GL_Code,
	broadcast: 'none')~> LookupGLcode
GetGLCodes select(mapColumn(
		Relation_GL_Code = GL_Code,
		Relation_Category = Category,
		Relation_Cash_Flow_Code = Cash_Flow_Code
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectCOAcolumns
TransactionValidFundAsset@ValidFundAsset split(not(isNull(GL_Code)),
	disjoint: false) ~> TransactionTypeGL@(TransactionTypeGL, TransactionTypeCF)
TrimSingleQuoteFromGLcode select(mapColumn(
		Date,
		Transaction_Code,
		Cashflow_Code,
		Fund_ID,
		Asset_ID,
		Trx_Type,
		GL_Code,
		GL_Description,
		Amount,
		Relation_Asset_ID,
		Relation_Fund_ID
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectGLData
TransactionTypeGL@TransactionTypeCF select(mapColumn(
		Date,
		Transaction_Code,
		Cashflow_Code,
		Fund_ID,
		Asset_ID,
		Trx_Type,
		GL_Code,
		GL_Description,
		Amount
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectCasfFlowData
LookupGLcode split(GL_Code == Relation_GL_Code,
	disjoint: false) ~> ConditionalSplitValidGL@(ValidGL, NotValidGL)
LookupFundAndAsset split(not(isNull(Relation_Fund_ID)),
	disjoint: false) ~> TransactionValidFundAsset@(ValidFundAsset, InvalidFundAsset)
DerivedColumnValidationErrorFund select(mapColumn(
		Date,
		Transaction_Code,
		Cashflow_Code,
		Fund_ID,
		Asset_ID,
		Trx_Type,
		GL_Code,
		GL_Description,
		Amount,
		Validation_Error
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectInvalidFundAssetData
TransactionValidFundAsset@InvalidFundAsset derive(Validation_Error = toString('Invalid Fund or Asset')) ~> DerivedColumnValidationErrorFund
ConditionalSplitValidGL@NotValidGL derive(Validation_Error = toString('Invalid GL Code')) ~> DerivedColumnValidationErrorGL
DerivedColumnValidationErrorGL select(mapColumn(
		Date,
		Transaction_Code,
		Cashflow_Code,
		Fund_ID,
		Asset_ID,
		Trx_Type,
		GL_Code,
		GL_Description,
		Amount,
		Validation_Error
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectInvalidGLdata
ConditionalSplitValidGL@ValidGL select(mapColumn(
		Date,
		Transaction_Code,
		Cashflow_Code,
		Fund_ID,
		Asset_ID,
		Trx_Type,
		GL_Code,
		GL_Description,
		Amount
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectValidGLdata
SelectValidGLdata, SelectInvalidGLdata, SelectCasfFlowData, SelectInvalidFundAssetData union(byName: true)~> UnionAll
TransactionTypeGL@TransactionTypeGL derive(GL_Code = trim(GL_Code,'\'')) ~> TrimSingleQuoteFromGLcode
LoadFromScrubbedToStagingDB derive(Amount = toDecimal(Amount,18,2,'###,###.##')) ~> ConvertAmountToValidFormat
SelectForTarget sink(input(
		Trx_Code as string,
		Fund_ID as string,
		Asset_ID as string,
		GL_Code as string,
		Cash_Flow_Code as string,
		Debit_Credit as string,
		Trx_Date as timestamp,
		Trx_Desc as string,
		Trx_Type as string,
		Trx_Amount as decimal(18,2),
		validation_error as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	truncate:true,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		Trx_Code,
		Fund_ID,
		Asset_ID,
		GL_Code,
		Cash_Flow_Code,
		Debit_Credit,
		Trx_Date,
		Trx_Desc,
		Trx_Type,
		Trx_Amount,
		validation_error
	)) ~> StagingDB

source(output(
		Date as string,
		Transaction_Code as string,
		Cashflow_Code as string,
		Fund_ID as string,
		Asset_ID as string,
		Trx_Type as string,
		GL_Code as string,
		GL_Description as string,
		Amount as string,
		Debit_Credit as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> LoadFromScrubbedToStagingDB
source(output(
		Asset_ID as string,
		Fund_ID as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'SELECT [Asset_ID]\n      ,[Fund_ID]\n  FROM [relational].[Asset]\n  WHERE [record_deleted_flag] = 0',
	format: 'query') ~> GetAssetMaster
source(output(
		GL_Code as string,
		Category as string,
		Cash_Flow_Code as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'SELECT [GL_Code]\n      ,[Category]\n      ,[Cash_Flow_Code]\n  FROM [relational].[Chart_of_Account]\n  WHERE [record_deleted_flag] = 0',
	format: 'query') ~> GetGLCodes
CheckAmoutNotNull@ValidAmountAndDateAndTrxCode select(mapColumn(
		Date,
		Transaction_Code,
		Cashflow_Code,
		Fund_ID,
		Asset_ID,
		Trx_Type,
		GL_Code,
		GL_Description,
		Amount,
		Debit_Credit
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> SelectSourceColumns
UnionAll derive(Debit_Credit = upper(Debit_Credit),
		Trx_Amount = abs(toDecimal(Amount,18,2))) ~> SetDerivations
SetDerivations select(mapColumn(
		Trx_Date = Date,
		Trx_Code = Transaction_Code,
		Cash_Flow_Code = Cashflow_Code,
		Fund_ID,
		Asset_ID,
		Trx_Type,
		GL_Code,
		Trx_Desc = GL_Description,
		validation_error = Validation_Error,
		Debit_Credit,
		Trx_Amount
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectForTarget
SelectSourceColumns, SelectFundColumns lookup(Asset_ID == Relation_Asset_ID
	&& Fund_ID == Relation_Fund_ID,
	broadcast: 'none')~> LookupFundAndAsset
GetAssetMaster select(mapColumn(
		Relation_Asset_ID = Asset_ID,
		Relation_Fund_ID = Fund_ID
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> SelectFundColumns
TransactionTypeGL@TransactionTypeGL, SelectCOAcolumns lookup(GL_Code == Relation_GL_Code,
	broadcast: 'none')~> LookupGLcode
GetGLCodes select(mapColumn(
		Relation_GL_Code = GL_Code,
		Relation_Category = Category,
		Relation_Cash_Flow_Code = Cash_Flow_Code
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectCOAcolumns
SelectCleanGLCodeData split(not(isNull(GL_Code)) && ( Trx_Type <=> 'Actual' || Trx_Type <=> 'Elimination' || Trx_Type <=> 'GL Adjustment' ),
	isNull(GL_Code) && Trx_Type <=> 'CF Adjustment',
	disjoint: false) ~> TransactionTypeGL@(TransactionTypeGL, TransactionTypeCF, InvalidTransaction)
DerivedColumnInvalidTransaction select(mapColumn(
		Date,
		Transaction_Code,
		Cashflow_Code,
		Fund_ID,
		Asset_ID,
		Trx_Type = Derived_Trx_type,
		GL_Code,
		GL_Description,
		Amount,
		Debit_Credit,
		Validation_Error
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectInvalidTransaction
LookupGLcode split(GL_Code == Relation_GL_Code,
	disjoint: false) ~> ConditionalSplitValidGL@(ValidGL, NotValidGL)
LookupFundAndAsset split(not(isNull(Relation_Fund_ID)),
	disjoint: false) ~> TransactionValidFundAsset@(ValidFundAsset, InvalidFundAsset)
DerivedColumnValidationErrorFund select(mapColumn(
		Date,
		Transaction_Code,
		Cashflow_Code,
		Fund_ID = Derived_Fund,
		Asset_ID = Derived_Asset,
		Trx_Type,
		GL_Code,
		GL_Description,
		Amount,
		Debit_Credit,
		Validation_Error
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectInvalidFundAssetData
TransactionValidFundAsset@InvalidFundAsset derive(Validation_Error = toString('Invalid Fund or Asset'),
		Derived_Fund = iif(isNull(Fund_ID), toString(''), Fund_ID),
		Derived_Asset = iif(isNull(Asset_ID), toString(''), Asset_ID)) ~> DerivedColumnValidationErrorFund
ConditionalSplitValidGL@NotValidGL derive(Validation_Error = toString('Invalid GL Code')) ~> DerivedColumnValidationErrorGL
DerivedColumnValidationErrorGL select(mapColumn(
		Date,
		Transaction_Code,
		Cashflow_Code,
		Fund_ID,
		Asset_ID,
		Trx_Type,
		GL_Code,
		GL_Description,
		Amount,
		Debit_Credit,
		Validation_Error
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectInvalidGLdata
ConditionalSplitValidGL@ValidGL select(mapColumn(
		Date,
		Transaction_Code,
		Cashflow_Code = Relation_Cash_Flow_Code,
		Fund_ID,
		Asset_ID,
		Trx_Type,
		GL_Code,
		GL_Description,
		Amount,
		Debit_Credit
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectValidGLdata
SelectValidGLdata, SelectInvalidGLdata, SelectInvalidTransaction, SelectInvalidFundAssetData, SelectCashFlow, SelectInvalidAmountOrDateOrTrxCode union(byName: true)~> UnionAll
LoadFromScrubbedToStagingDB derive(Amount = toDecimal(Amount,18,2,'###,###.##'),
		Date = toTimestamp(Date,'dd/MM/yyyy')) ~> ConvertAmountToValidFormat
TransactionTypeGL@TransactionTypeCF select(mapColumn(
		Date,
		Transaction_Code,
		Cashflow_Code,
		Fund_ID,
		Asset_ID,
		Trx_Type,
		GL_Code,
		GL_Description,
		Amount,
		Debit_Credit
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectCashFlow
TransactionTypeGL@InvalidTransaction derive(Validation_Error = toString('Invalid transaction type'),
		Derived_Trx_type = iif(isNull(Trx_Type),toString('Invalid'),Trx_Type)) ~> DerivedColumnInvalidTransaction
ConvertAmountToValidFormat split(not(isNull(Transaction_Code)) && not(isNull(Date)) && not(isNull(Amount)) && (Debit_Credit <=> 'Dr' || Debit_Credit <=> 'Cr'),
	disjoint: false) ~> CheckAmoutNotNull@(ValidAmountAndDateAndTrxCode, InvalidAmountOrDateOrTrxCode)
CheckAmoutNotNull@InvalidAmountOrDateOrTrxCode derive(Validation_Error = toString('Invalid Transaction Code or Date or Amount or Debit Credit indicator'),
		Derived_Date = iif(isNull(Date),toTimestamp('31/12/9999','dd/MM/yyyy'),Date),
		Derived_Amount = iif(isNull(Amount),toDecimal(0,18,2),Amount),
		Derived_TrxCode = iif(isNull(Transaction_Code),toString('Null Trx Code'),Transaction_Code),
		Derived_Debit_Credit = iif(isNull(Debit_Credit), toString('XX'), Debit_Credit)) ~> DerivedInvalidAmountOrDateOrTrxCode
DerivedInvalidAmountOrDateOrTrxCode select(mapColumn(
		Date = Derived_Date,
		Transaction_Code = Derived_TrxCode,
		Cashflow_Code,
		Fund_ID,
		Asset_ID,
		Trx_Type,
		GL_Code,
		GL_Description,
		Amount = Derived_Amount,
		Debit_Credit = Derived_Debit_Credit,
		Validation_Error
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectInvalidAmountOrDateOrTrxCode
TransactionValidFundAsset@ValidFundAsset derive(Derived_GL_Code = iif(GL_Code=='\'', toString(null()), trim(GL_Code,'\''))) ~> CleanGLCode
CleanGLCode select(mapColumn(
		Date,
		Transaction_Code,
		Cashflow_Code,
		Fund_ID,
		Asset_ID,
		Trx_Type,
		GL_Code = Derived_GL_Code,
		GL_Description,
		Amount,
		Debit_Credit
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectCleanGLCodeData
SelectForTarget sink(input(
		Trx_Code as string,
		Fund_ID as string,
		Asset_ID as string,
		GL_Code as string,
		Cash_Flow_Code as string,
		Debit_Credit as string,
		Trx_Date as timestamp,
		Trx_Desc as string,
		Trx_Type as string,
		Trx_Amount as decimal(18,2),
		validation_error as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	truncate:true,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		Trx_Code,
		Fund_ID,
		Asset_ID,
		GL_Code,
		Cash_Flow_Code,
		Debit_Credit,
		Trx_Date,
		Trx_Desc,
		Trx_Type,
		Trx_Amount,
		validation_error
	)) ~> StagingDB

source(output(
		Date as string,
		Transaction_Code as string,
		Cashflow_Code as string,
		Fund_ID as string,
		Asset_ID as string,
		Trx_Type as string,
		GL_Code as string,
		GL_Description as string,
		Amount as string,
		Debit_Credit as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> LoadFromScrubbedToStagingDB
source(output(
		Asset_ID as string,
		Fund_ID as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'SELECT [Asset_ID]\n      ,[Fund_ID]\n  FROM [relational].[Asset]\n  WHERE [record_deleted_flag] = 0',
	format: 'query') ~> GetAssetMaster
source(output(
		GL_Code as string,
		Category as string,
		Cash_Flow_Code as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'SELECT [GL_Code]\n      ,[Category]\n      ,[Cash_Flow_Code]\n  FROM [relational].[Chart_of_Account]\n  WHERE [record_deleted_flag] = 0',
	format: 'query') ~> GetGLCodes
CheckAmoutNotNull@ValidAmount select(mapColumn(
		Date,
		Transaction_Code,
		Cashflow_Code,
		Fund_ID,
		Asset_ID,
		Trx_Type,
		GL_Code,
		GL_Description,
		Amount
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> SelectSourceColumns
UnionAll derive(Debit_Credit = case(greaterOrEqual(toDecimal(Amount,18,2),0),'DR','CR'),
		Trx_Amount = abs(toDecimal(Amount,18,2)),
		Date = toTimestamp(Date,'dd/MM/yyyy')) ~> SetDerivations
SetDerivations select(mapColumn(
		Trx_Date = Date,
		Trx_Code = Transaction_Code,
		Cash_Flow_Code = Cashflow_Code,
		Fund_ID,
		Asset_ID,
		Trx_Type,
		GL_Code,
		Trx_Desc = GL_Description,
		validation_error = Validation_Error,
		Debit_Credit,
		Trx_Amount
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectForTarget
SelectSourceColumns, SelectFundColumns lookup(Asset_ID == Relation_Asset_ID
	&& Fund_ID == Relation_Fund_ID,
	broadcast: 'none')~> LookupFundAndAsset
GetAssetMaster select(mapColumn(
		Relation_Asset_ID = Asset_ID,
		Relation_Fund_ID = Fund_ID
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> SelectFundColumns
SelectGLData, SelectCOAcolumns lookup(GL_Code == Relation_GL_Code,
	broadcast: 'none')~> LookupGLcode
GetGLCodes select(mapColumn(
		Relation_GL_Code = GL_Code,
		Relation_Category = Category,
		Relation_Cash_Flow_Code = Cash_Flow_Code
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectCOAcolumns
TransactionValidFundAsset@ValidFundAsset split(not(isNull(GL_Code)) && ( Trx_Type <=> 'Actual' || Trx_Type <=> 'Elimination' || Trx_Type <=> 'GL Adjustment' ),
	isNull(GL_Code) && Trx_Type <=> 'CF Adjustment',
	disjoint: false) ~> TransactionTypeGL@(TransactionTypeGL, TransactionTypeCF, InvalidTransaction)
TrimSingleQuoteFromGLcode select(mapColumn(
		Date,
		Transaction_Code,
		Cashflow_Code,
		Fund_ID,
		Asset_ID,
		Trx_Type,
		GL_Code,
		GL_Description,
		Amount,
		Relation_Asset_ID,
		Relation_Fund_ID
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectGLData
DerivedColumnInvalidTransaction select(mapColumn(
		Date,
		Transaction_Code,
		Cashflow_Code,
		Fund_ID,
		Asset_ID,
		Trx_Type,
		GL_Code,
		GL_Description,
		Amount,
		Validation_Error
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectInvalidTransaction
LookupGLcode split(GL_Code == Relation_GL_Code,
	disjoint: false) ~> ConditionalSplitValidGL@(ValidGL, NotValidGL)
LookupFundAndAsset split(not(isNull(Relation_Fund_ID)),
	disjoint: false) ~> TransactionValidFundAsset@(ValidFundAsset, InvalidFundAsset)
DerivedColumnValidationErrorFund select(mapColumn(
		Date,
		Transaction_Code,
		Cashflow_Code,
		Fund_ID,
		Asset_ID,
		Trx_Type,
		GL_Code,
		GL_Description,
		Amount,
		Validation_Error
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectInvalidFundAssetData
TransactionValidFundAsset@InvalidFundAsset derive(Validation_Error = toString('Invalid Fund or Asset')) ~> DerivedColumnValidationErrorFund
ConditionalSplitValidGL@NotValidGL derive(Validation_Error = toString('Invalid GL Code')) ~> DerivedColumnValidationErrorGL
DerivedColumnValidationErrorGL select(mapColumn(
		Date,
		Transaction_Code,
		Cashflow_Code,
		Fund_ID,
		Asset_ID,
		Trx_Type,
		GL_Code,
		GL_Description,
		Amount,
		Validation_Error
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectInvalidGLdata
ConditionalSplitValidGL@ValidGL select(mapColumn(
		Date,
		Transaction_Code,
		Cashflow_Code = Relation_Cash_Flow_Code,
		Fund_ID,
		Asset_ID,
		Trx_Type,
		GL_Code,
		GL_Description,
		Amount
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectValidGLdata
SelectValidGLdata, SelectInvalidGLdata, SelectInvalidTransaction, SelectInvalidFundAssetData, SelectCashFlow, SelectInvalidAmount union(byName: true)~> UnionAll
TransactionTypeGL@TransactionTypeGL derive(GL_Code = trim(GL_Code,'\'')) ~> TrimSingleQuoteFromGLcode
LoadFromScrubbedToStagingDB derive(Amount = toDecimal(Amount,18,2,'###,###.##')) ~> ConvertAmountToValidFormat
TransactionTypeGL@TransactionTypeCF select(mapColumn(
		Date,
		Transaction_Code,
		Cashflow_Code,
		Fund_ID,
		Asset_ID,
		Trx_Type,
		GL_Code,
		GL_Description,
		Amount
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectCashFlow
TransactionTypeGL@InvalidTransaction derive(Validation_Error = toString('Invalid transaction type')) ~> DerivedColumnInvalidTransaction
ConvertAmountToValidFormat split(not(isNull(Amount)),
	disjoint: false) ~> CheckAmoutNotNull@(ValidAmount, InvalidAmount)
CheckAmoutNotNull@InvalidAmount derive(Validation_Error = toString('Invalid Amount or Debit Credit indicator')) ~> DerivedInvalidAmount
DerivedInvalidAmount select(mapColumn(
		Date,
		Transaction_Code,
		Cashflow_Code,
		Fund_ID,
		Asset_ID,
		Trx_Type,
		GL_Code,
		GL_Description,
		Amount,
		Validation_Error
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectInvalidAmount
SelectForTarget sink(input(
		Trx_Code as string,
		Fund_ID as string,
		Asset_ID as string,
		GL_Code as string,
		Cash_Flow_Code as string,
		Debit_Credit as string,
		Trx_Date as timestamp,
		Trx_Desc as string,
		Trx_Type as string,
		Trx_Amount as decimal(18,2),
		validation_error as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	truncate:true,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		Trx_Code,
		Fund_ID,
		Asset_ID,
		GL_Code,
		Cash_Flow_Code,
		Debit_Credit,
		Trx_Date,
		Trx_Desc,
		Trx_Type,
		Trx_Amount,
		validation_error
	)) ~> StagingDB

source(output(
		{GL-Code} as string,
		{GL-Desc} as string,
		Category as string,
		{Cash-Flow-Code} as string,
		{Parent-GL-Code} as string,
		Level as string,
		Debit_Credit as string,
		Reporting_1 as string,
		Reporting_2 as string,
		Reporting_3 as string,
		Reporting_4 as string,
		Reporting_5 as string,
		Reporting_6 as string,
		Reporting_7 as string,
		Reporting_8 as string,
		Reporting_9 as string,
		Reporting_10 as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> LoadFromScrubbedToStagingDB
DerivedColumn select(mapColumn(
		{GL-Code} = Derived_GL_Code,
		{GL-Desc},
		Category,
		{Cash-Flow-Code},
		{Parent-GL-Code} = Derived_Parent_GL_Code,
		Level,
		Debit_Credit = Derived_Debit_Credit,
		Reporting_1,
		Reporting_2,
		Reporting_3,
		Reporting_4,
		Reporting_5,
		Reporting_6,
		Reporting_7,
		Reporting_8,
		Reporting_9,
		Reporting_10
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> SelectSourceColumns
GetFirstRowFromAnalyticsFunction derive(Derived_GL_Code = trim({GL-Code}, '\''),
		Derived_Parent_GL_Code = iif({Parent-GL-Code}=='\'',toString(null()),trim({Parent-GL-Code}, '\'')),
		Derived_Debit_Credit = upper(Debit_Credit)) ~> DerivedColumn
LoadFromScrubbedToStagingDB window(over({GL-Code}),
	asc({GL-Code}, false),
	RN = rowNumber()) ~> AnalyticsFunctionGroupFundID
AnalyticsFunctionGroupFundID filter(RN==1) ~> GetFirstRowFromAnalyticsFunction
SelectSourceColumns sink(input(
		GL_Code as string,
		GL_Desc as string,
		Category as string,
		Cash_Flow_Code as string,
		GL_Parent_Code as string,
		GL_Level_Code as integer,
		Debit_Credit as string,
		Reporting_1 as string,
		Reporting_2 as string,
		Reporting_3 as string,
		Reporting_4 as string,
		Reporting_5 as string,
		Reporting_6 as string,
		Reporting_7 as string,
		Reporting_8 as string,
		Reporting_9 as string,
		Reporting_10 as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	truncate:true,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		GL_Code = {GL-Code},
		GL_Desc = {GL-Desc},
		Category,
		Cash_Flow_Code = {Cash-Flow-Code},
		GL_Parent_Code = {Parent-GL-Code},
		GL_Level_Code = Level,
		Debit_Credit,
		Reporting_1,
		Reporting_2,
		Reporting_3,
		Reporting_4,
		Reporting_5,
		Reporting_6,
		Reporting_7,
		Reporting_8,
		Reporting_9,
		Reporting_10
	)) ~> StagingDB
